name: Passing Fancy, Mass
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Spymaster's Handbook © 2016, Paizo Inc.
target: one living creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions as per passing fancy except as noted.
target_zh: 一个活物/等级，彼此相距不超过30呎
text_zh: 这种法术如同心血来潮，除了以上区别。
